name: .TCM File Extension
summary: Learn about .TCM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 2D or 3D design draft created by Mac editions of the TurboCAD computer-aided design (CAD) software; stores a drawing, including the geometry and display properties; can be rotated and viewed with lighting effects and different camera angles using the software.

content: TCM files are similar to .TC2 and .TC3 files. All three file types are only used by the Mac editions of TurboCAD.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
